title: Full-Stack Web Development
shortDescription: End-to-end web application development from concept to deployment

children.text: I build modern, scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies. From responsive frontends to robust backends, I deliver complete solutions tailored to your business needs.

pricing.description: Starting at $5,000 for MVP. Final price depends on project scope and complexity.

title: AI & Machine Learning Integration
shortDescription: Integrate AI capabilities into your existing applications

children.text: Leverage the power of AI to enhance your applications. I specialize in integrating OpenAI, custom ML models, and intelligent automation into existing systems.

pricing.description: Starting at $3,000. Pricing varies based on complexity and model requirements.

title: Technical Consulting & Code Review
shortDescription: Expert guidance on architecture, performance, and best practices

children.text: Get expert advice on your technical challenges. I provide comprehensive code reviews, architecture planning, and strategic technical guidance.

pricing.description: $150/hour for consulting services. Package deals available for ongoing engagements.

title: API Development & Integration
shortDescription: Build and integrate robust, scalable APIs

children.text: Custom API development and third-party integrations. I create RESTful and GraphQL APIs that are secure, well-documented, and built to scale.

pricing.description: Starting at $2,500. Final cost depends on API complexity and integrations.

title: Mobile App Development
shortDescription: Cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android

children.text: Build beautiful, performant mobile apps with React Native. One codebase for both iOS and Android, with native performance and user experience.

pricing.description: Starting at $8,000 for basic apps. Complex apps range from $15,000+
